summary: Completed e2e testing of Project Roadmap and Consultant Performance features. All 19 backend tests pass. Frontend pages load correctly with all UI components working - Kanban 4-column view, Table view, 3 tabs (Metrics Config, Scores, Summary), admin-only approve/reject buttons.

minor.issue: Overall score shows 0% when metric_ids in request don't match the config metrics the API finds. This is expected behavior but can be confusing.

critical_code_review_comments: Roadmap CRUD APIs working correctly with phases and items, IDs auto-generated
Performance metrics require admin approval before consultants can be scored against them
Non-admin users correctly receive 403 when trying to approve/reject metrics
Kanban view shows all 4 statuses: not_started, in_progress, completed, delayed
Client notification for roadmap submission is MOCKED (queued but not sent)
seed_data_creation: Created test roadmaps with 4 item statuses (TEST_Kanban_Status_Roadmap), performance metrics configs, performance scores
context_for_next_testing_agent: Project roadmaps store phases and items with status tracking. Performance scoring requires approved metrics config - use the same project_id to ensure metric IDs match. The overall_score calculation only works when submitted score metric_ids match the config metrics (backend uses find_one which may find different configs if project has multiple approved).

features_tested.POST /api/roadmaps: PASSED - Creates roadmap with monthly phases, items get auto-generated IDs, default status draft
features_tested.GET /api/roadmaps: PASSED - Returns list, supports project_id filter
features_tested.GET /api/roadmaps/{id}: PASSED - Returns full detail with phases and items
features_tested.PATCH /api/roadmaps/{id}/items/{item_id}: PASSED - Updates item status, adds completed_at for completed status
features_tested.POST /api/performance-metrics: PASSED - Creates config with pending_approval status
features_tested.POST /api/performance-metrics/{id}/appro: PASSED - Admin only, sets approved status
features_tested.POST /api/performance-metrics/{id}/rejec: PASSED - Admin only, sets rejected status
features_tested.POST /api/performance-scores: PASSED - Creates score with weighted overall_score calculation
features_tested.GET /api/performance-scores: PASSED - Returns scores with overall_score, supports filters
features_tested.GET /api/performance-scores/summary: PASSED - Returns per-consultant aggregated avg_score and months_rated
features_tested./project-roadmap page: PASSED - List view, detail view with Table/Kanban toggle, Create Roadmap dialog
features_tested./consultant-performance page: PASSED - 3 tabs working, admin sees approve/reject buttons, manager only sees Rate button
features_tested.Navigation Consulting section: PASSED - Both 'Project Roadmap' and 'Performance' links visible
features_tested.Kanban 4 columns: PASSED - Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Delayed all visible

mocked_apis_list: Email sending - roadmap client submission notification queued but not sent
